comments.body:
Please add this comment
`// Regression test for https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/28728`
What was the reason for this change?
Because the hover support adds another frame to the animation.

These two lines were changed from 2 to 3 a while ago when hover was introduced. https://github.com/flutter/flutter/pull/31438/files#r283037816
This PR happens to change them back to 2, which is good.
